sentences.sentence: The value of China decrease greatly with steady steps between 2010 and 2013, then it increase with steady steps by 2018; while Japan keep stable between 2010 and 2018.

sentences.sentence: The value of China decrease greatly with steady steps between 2010 and 2013, then it increase with steady steps by 2018; while Japan keep stable between 2010 and 2018.
